lead_paragraph: For soccer striker Alejandro Martinuccio, the surgery on his right knee two months ago was a tough blow, keeping him off the field as his small Brazilian team, Chapecoense, pulled off surprise wins against top clubs from his native Argentina.

headline.print_headline: Tragic Crash Was a Near Miss for Many at Brazil Soccer Club
headline.main: Tragic Crash Was a Near Miss for Many at Brazil Soccer Club
